author: Ryan Pickrell
title: Trump says there will be 'suicides by the thousands' if the US coronavirus shutdown continues
description: As countries around the world lock down to prevent the spread of the virus, President Donald Trump is pushing for Americans to return to work. "We have to put the country to work," he said on Fox News Tuesday, warning that if the economy suffers, there will b…
content:
President Donald Trump said Tuesday that there will be "suicides by the thousands" if entire sectors of the US  economy remain shutdown in an effort to contain the spread of the virus that threatens to overwhelm hospitals.
"We have to put the country to work… [+2135 chars]
